t: Direct-to-Consumer Brands on Amazon: Pros, Cons & How to Sell Successfully
s: April 4, 2023 - Some big brands are leaving Amazon (hint: Nike). Is Amazon still a successful channel for direct-to-consumer brands? Read on for insights & tips on how brands can succeed on Amazon

t: How To Know if a Brand Sells Direct on Amazon
s: One of the ways to determine if a brand sells direct on Amazon is by looking for indications on their product listings. Brands that sell directly may mention being the "official seller" or "manufacturer" or "direct" on the seller name. This information can give you confidence that you are buying ...

t: Nike to resume selling directly on Amazon for first time since 2019
s: 6 days ago - Apple and L'Oreal are among other gated brands on Amazon. "We value independent sellers, and we're providing an extended period of time for the small number of sellers affected to sell through their inventory of overlapping items," Amazon's spokesperson added.
